docs.snippet: The first sweeping police overhaul proposed in Texas following a black woman's 2015 death in jail after a confrontational traffic stop would revamp racial profiling laws and officer training — measures that one law enforcement group derided ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The first sweeping police overhaul proposed in Texas following a black woman's 2015 death in jail after a confrontational traffic stop would revamp racial profiling laws and officer training — measures that one law enforcement group derided Thursday as misguided, and another said was financially problematic.

docs.lead_paragraph: John J. Gotti, the grandson and namesake of New York's infamous "Teflon Don" mob boss, was sentenced on Thursday to eight years in prison after pleading guilty last month to selling oxycodone, an opioid prescription pain medication, prosecutors said.

docs.lead_paragraph: A judge convicted a Chicago woman of first-degree murder Thursday in the strangulation death of her 8-year-old granddaughter, who was tied up and deprived of food and water for days while keeping track of the abuse in a journal later used as evidence.

headline.main: Chicago Woman Convicted in Torture Death of Granddaughter, 8
